## Live WSL Bash Terminal

This page provides direct access to your WSL bash environment through a web-based terminal powered by ttyd.

### Terminal Interface

<div class="terminal-container" onclick="document.getElementById('terminal-iframe').focus()">
  <iframe 
    src="http://localhost:7681" 
    class="terminal-frame"
    id="terminal-iframe"
    title="Interactive Bash Terminal"
    sandbox="allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-forms allow-pointer-lock allow-modals allow-popups"
    allow="clipboard-read; clipboard-write"
    frameborder="0">
  </iframe>
</div>

<script>
function resizeTerminal(size) {
  const iframe = document.getElementById('terminal-iframe');
  const container = document.querySelector('.terminal-container');
  
  switch(size) {
    case 'small':
      iframe.style.height = '300px';
      container.style.width = '80%';
      break;
    case 'medium':
      iframe.style.height = '500px';
      container.style.width = '90%';
      break;
    case 'large':
      iframe.style.height = '700px';
      container.style.width = '100%';
      break;
    case 'fullscreen':
      iframe.style.height = '80vh';
      container.style.width = '100vw';
      container.style.position = 'fixed';
      container.style.top = '0';
      container.style.left = '0';
      container.style.zIndex = '9999';
      break;
  }
}

// Enhanced focus handling
window.addEventListener('load', function() {
  const iframe = document.getElementById('terminal-iframe');
  
  iframe.focus();
  
  iframe.addEventListener('click', function() {
    this.focus();
  });
  
  iframe.onload = function() {
    try {
      this.contentWindow.focus();
    } catch(e) {
      console.log('Cannot focus iframe content due to cross-origin restrictions');
    }
  };
});
</script>

### Usage Instructions

- **Click inside the terminal** to start typing commands
- **Use resize buttons** above the terminal to adjust size  
- **Right-click** in terminal for copy/paste options
- **Press F11** in the iframe for full browser terminal mode

::: {.callout-warning}
**Troubleshooting**: If the terminal doesn't respond to input:
1. **MOST IMPORTANT**: Ensure ttyd is running with writable mode: `ttyd -W -p 7681 bash`
2. Try refreshing the page
3. Click directly in the terminal area
4. Check that port 7681 is accessible
:::
